reactTrigger.expression:
//AmpDebugBuff
(GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent())) == GetProjectileTypeId() ||
GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent())) == GetAbilityTypeId()) &&
GetOwner() != GetTarget() &&
GetOwner() != GetSource() &&
!HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Element.Magical.Fire") &&
!HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "ability.weaponcombo")
